vote.title: To Honor and Recognize the Founding & Establishment of Fortuna Bank, Ohio's First Women-Owned Bank, During Women's History Month
vote.description:
Title
 
To Honor and Recognize the Founding & Establishment of Fortuna Bank, Ohio's First Women-Owned Bank, During Women's History Month
 
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Fortuna Bank, a newly established financial institution, celebrated its grand opening in Columbus, Ohio, on January 30, 2025, marking the culmination of years of planning and dedication to bringing a unique banking experience to the region; and,
 
WHEREAS, Fortuna Bank distinguishes itself as the first women-owned bank in the state of Ohio, representing a significant milestone for the financial landscape of Columbus and the entire state and showcasing the value of diversity and inclusivity within the banking sector; and,
 
WHEREAS, Fortuna Bank joins a small but growing number of twenty women-owned banks currently operating in the United States, emphasizing the vital role of such institutions in promoting economic empowerment and representation within the financial industry nationwide; and,
 
WHEREAS, Fortuna Bank was founded through the vision and dedication of a group of local businesswomen and community leaders in Central Ohio, who recognized a critical need for financial services specifically focused on supporting the growth of women entrepreneurs and traditionally underserved businesses in the area; and,
 
WHEREAS, Fortuna Bank is unwavering in its commitment to addressing the financial needs of small businesses and women by providing a comprehensive suite of financial solutions, including tailored loan services designed for entrepreneurs, access to vital financial capital, valuable mentorship programs, and essential educational resources to foster financial literacy and business growth; and,
 
WHEREAS, Fortuna Bank aims to foster financial independence within our community, providing accessible and innovative online banking solutions and promoting financial well-being; and,
 
WHEREAS, the grand opening of Fortuna Bank represents an invaluable addition to Columbus’ financial community, promising to empower individuals and businesses to achieve their financial goals while creating new job opportunities; now therefore,
 
BE IT RESOLVED THAT THIS COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: hereby formally recognizes and commends Fortuna Bank on its grand opening and for its dedication to serving the financial needs of small businesses and women in the community, and further acknowledges its historic achievement as the first women-owned bank in the state of Ohio.
